{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = AX201NGW 01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 2x2 WLAN/BT PCIe M.2 2230 Combo Adapter Card |caption2 = |pp = https://ark.intel.com/content/www/us/en/ark/products/130293/intel-wi-fi-6-ax201.html |sp = https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/support/products/130293/network-and-i-o/wireless-networking/intel-wireless-products/intel-wi-fi-6-series/intel-wi-fi-6-ax201.html |dl = |wikidevi = Intel_Wi-Fi_6_AX201_(AX201NGW) |wikipedia = |brand = Intel |model = Wi-Fi 6 AX201 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = ''Harrison Peak 2'' |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = AX201NGW |page_start_date = 01/29/2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Intel_Wi-Fi_6_AX201_(AX201NGW) |sernum = |wlclass = AX2500 |series = |if = M.2 |if_bus_version = CNVio |ifconnector = M.2 (CNVio) |formfactor = 2230 (Key E) |vendor_id = 8086 |device_id = a0f0 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = PD9AX201NG, MSQAX201NG |icid = 1000M‐AX201NG, 3568A-AX201NG |boardid = J86328-001 |ecc_id = |oui = 34:13:E8, 84:FD:D1 |chip1 = Intel;WCS22500;WCS22500, L825NA02, Q B2; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MHF4 |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax |axqam = 574/1922 |802.11ax = 574/1201 |acqam = |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = [https://cateee.net/lkddb/web-lkddb/WLAN_VENDOR_INTEL.html '''iwlwifi''']
''Full support it is available in 5.5.0-rc kernel'' |windriv = '''''Win10''' (64-bit only)'' |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = Bluetooth 5.0, HE160, VHT160, CNVio, DFS (slave), |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 01/28/2019 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :''Harrison Peak 2'', NGFF M.2 2230 (CNVio) {{FCC ST|07/27/2019}} {{See also|List of 802.11ax Hardware#Wireless adapters}} *The Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX201 adapter is a CRF (Companion RF) module :It currently only support ceretain processors: *[[Intel CPU|Intel Core]] (10th Gen) *[[Intel Celeron]] - Gemini Lake *[[Intel Pentium]] Silver - Gemini Lake '''Note:''' Even though you can insert these '''CRF''' to a standard ''M.2 (Key E)'' socket, :they are only compatible with a system designed with the '''CNVi'''. ===FCC info=== *'''FCC ID''': [https://fccid.io/MSQAX201NG MSQAX201NG] ([https://fccid.io/MSQAX201NG/Label/ID-Label-4568022 label]) :• ASUS J412F • ASUS TP412F • ASUS P1452F :• ASUS R563F • ASUS SF4100F ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/intel-mentions-intel-wi-fi-6-ax200-cyclone-peak-2-and-ax201-harrison-peak-2-network-adapters.49206/ ''Intel mentions Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX200 (Cyclone Peak 2) and AX201 (Harrison Peak 2) network adapters'' on '''SNB''' forums] ==See also== :;[[Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX series]] • [[Intel]] • *[[Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX200 (AX200NGW)]] • ''Cyclone Peak 2'' • [8086:2723] :*[[Rivet Networks Killer Wireless-AX 1650x (200NGW)]] *[[Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX200 (AX200D2WL)]] • ''Cyclone Peak 2'' :*[[Rivet Networks Killer Wireless-AX 1650w (200D2W)]] *[[Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX201 (AX201NGW)]] • ''Harrison Peak 2'' • [8086:a0f0] :*[[Rivet Networks Killer Wireless-AX 1650i (201NGW)]] • [8086:34f0] *[[Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX201 (AX201D2W)]] • ''Harrison Peak 2'' :*[[Rivet Networks Killer Wireless-AX 1650s (201D2W)]] *[[Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX201 (AX201D2WL)]] • ''Harrison Peak 2'' [[Category:English Documentation]]
